jfxtras.labs.scene.control

Class BigDecimalLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.control.Control
          • javafx.scene.control.Labeled
            • javafx.scene.control.Label
              • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.BigDecimalLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class BigDecimalLabel
extends javafx.scene.control.Label
    Label implementation that displays a formatted BigDecimal.
